author: shalin
msg: SOLR-2610 -- Add an option to delete index through CoreAdmin UNLOAD action

author: julianfoad
msg: In the dirent_uri tests, make test_uri_is_canonical() share a set of test
cases with test_uri_canonicalize(), because their semantics should be
compatible and this helps to ensure that they are.  The new set of test
cases is the union of the two old sets.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(uri_canonical_tests): New set of test cases.
(testcase_uri_is_canonical_t): Remove.
(test_uri_canonicalize, test_uri_is_canonical): Use the shared
uri_canonical_tests instead of each of these having its own internal set
of test cases. Don't test svn_uri_canonicalize() in
test_uri_is_canonical(), because it is now fully tested in
test_uri_canonicalize().

author: julianfoad
msg: Re-format some dirent_uri doc strings for nicer Doxygen output.
* subversion/include/svn_dirent_uri.h
(svn_dirent_canonicalize, svn_relpath_canonicalize, svn_uri_canonicalize):
Re-format the list of transformations.
(svn_dirent_is_canonical, svn_relpath_is_canonical, svn_uri_is_canonical):
Add a cross-reference to the corresponding _canonicalize function.
